# peptools

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This is a work in progress...!

## Installation

You can install the development version of peptools from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("immunomicslab/peptools")
```

## Example

- First we load the library

```{r libload}
library(peptools)
```

- Then, we can use `pep_ran()` to generate 10 random 9-mers

```{r}
pep_ran(n = 10, k = 9)
```
